00049 bool Hypertable::ReactorRunner::ms_shutdown = false;
00050 bool Hypertable::ReactorRunner::ms_record_arrival_clocks = false;
00051 HandlerMapPtr Hypertable::ReactorRunner::ms_handler_map_ptr;

00054 void ReactorRunner::operator()() {
00055   int n;
00056   IOHandler *handler;
00057   std::set<IOHandler *> removed_handlers;
00058   PollTimeout timeout;
00059   bool did_delay = false;
00060   clock_t arrival_clocks = 0;
00061 
00062   HT_EXPECT(Config::properties, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00063 
00064   uint32_t dispatch_delay = Config::properties->get_i32("Comm.DispatchDelay");
00065 
00066 #if defined(__linux__)
00067   struct epoll_event events[256];
00068   bool got_clocks = false;
00069 
00070   while ((n = epoll_wait(m_reactor_ptr->poll_fd, events, 256,
00071           timeout.get_millis())) >= 0 || errno == EINTR) {
00072 
00073     if (ms_record_arrival_clocks)
00074       got_clocks = false;
00075 
00076     if (dispatch_delay)
00077       did_delay = false;
00078 
00079     m_reactor_ptr->get_removed_handlers(removed_handlers);
00080     if (!ms_shutdown)
00081       HT_DEBUGF("epoll_wait returned %d events", n);
00082     for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
00083       if (removed_handlers.count((IOHandler *)events[i].data.ptr) == 0) {
00084         handler = (IOHandler *)events[i].data.ptr;
00085         // dispatch delay for testing
00086         if (dispatch_delay && !did_delay && (events[i].events & EPOLLIN)) {
00087           poll(0, 0, (int)dispatch_delay);
00088           did_delay = true;
00089         }
00090         if (ms_record_arrival_clocks && !got_clocks
00091             && (events[i].events & EPOLLIN)) {
00092           arrival_clocks = std::clock();
00093           got_clocks = true;
00094         }
00095         if (handler && handler->handle_event(&events[i], arrival_clocks)) {
00096           ms_handler_map_ptr->decomission_handler(handler->get_address());
00097           removed_handlers.insert(handler);
00098         }
00099       }
00100     }
00101     if (!removed_handlers.empty())
00102       cleanup_and_remove_handlers(removed_handlers);
00103     m_reactor_ptr->handle_timeouts(timeout);
00104     if (ms_shutdown)
00105       return;
00106   }
00107 
00108   if (!ms_shutdown)
00109     HT_ERRORF("epoll_wait(%d) failed : %s", m_reactor_ptr->poll_fd,
00110               strerror(errno));
00111 
00112 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00113   struct kevent events[32];
00114 
00115   while ((n = kevent(m_reactor_ptr->kqd, NULL, 0, events, 32,
00116           timeout.get_timespec())) >= 0 || errno == EINTR) {
00117 
00118     if (dispatch_delay)
00119       did_delay = false;
00120 
00121     m_reactor_ptr->get_removed_handlers(removed_handlers);
00122     for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
00123       handler = (IOHandler *)events[i].udata;
00124       if (removed_handlers.count(handler) == 0) {
00125         // dispatch delay for testing
00126         if (dispatch_delay && !did_delay && events[i].filter == EVFILT_READ) {
00127           poll(0, 0, (int)dispatch_delay);
00128           did_delay = true;
00129         }
00130         if (handler && handler->handle_event(&events[i], arrival_clocks)) {
00131           ms_handler_map_ptr->decomission_handler(handler->get_address());
00132           removed_handlers.insert(handler);
00133         }
00134       }
00135     }
00136     if (!removed_handlers.empty())
00137       cleanup_and_remove_handlers(removed_handlers);
00138     m_reactor_ptr->handle_timeouts(timeout);
00139     if (ms_shutdown)
00140       return;
00141   }
00142 
00143   if (!ms_shutdown)
00144     HT_ERRORF("kevent(%d) failed : %s", m_reactor_ptr->kqd, strerror(errno));
00145 
00146 #endif
00147 }

00151 void
00152 ReactorRunner::cleanup_and_remove_handlers(std::set<IOHandler *> &handlers) {
00153   foreach(IOHandler *handler, handlers) {
00154 #if defined(__linux__)
00155     struct epoll_event event;
00156     memset(&event, 0, sizeof(struct epoll_event));
00157     if (epoll_ctl(m_reactor_ptr->poll_fd, EPOLL_CTL_DEL, handler->get_sd(),
00158         &event) < 0) {
00159       if (!ms_shutdown)
00160         HT_ERRORF("epoll_ctl(EPOLL_CTL_DEL, %d) failure, %s", handler->get_sd(),
00161                   strerror(errno));
00162       continue;
00163     }
00164 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00165     struct kevent devents[2];
00166     EV_SET(&devents[0], handler->get_sd(), EVFILT_READ, EV_DELETE, 0, 0, 0);
00167     EV_SET(&devents[1], handler->get_sd(), EVFILT_WRITE, EV_DELETE, 0, 0, 0);
00168     if (kevent(m_reactor_ptr->kqd, devents, 2, NULL, 0, NULL) == -1
00169         && errno != ENOENT) {
00170       if (!ms_shutdown)
00171         HT_ERRORF("kevent(%d) : %s", handler->get_sd(), strerror(errno));
00172       continue;
00173     }
00174 #else
00175     ImplementMe;
00176 #endif
00177     close(handler->get_sd());
00178     ms_handler_map_ptr->purge_handler(handler);
00179     m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(handler);
00180   }
00181 }
